chapter.title: Deploying the raw image

note.title: Installation using the raw image does not create a boot EFI entry.
note.para: During the deployment of the raw image, the image of the system is just copied to the selected disk. Therefore, an EFI boot entry is not created (like it normally would if the system is deployed using an installer). You might need to manually boot your system using the EFI shell by selecting the &slema; boot loader. After the first boot, you can use efibootmgr to create the boot entry. efibootmgr is available by default in the deployed image.
